name: Fireside chat with Angelo, founder of build_
description: The cumulative value of the top 100 emerging startup ecosystems increased 96% from 2021 to 2022 alone.  Network states have the ability to rapidly unlock equity and (re)activate startup ecosystems regardless of latitude or longitude in the context of this growth.  This in turn will create (re)new(ed) ventures, economies, and ultimately cities themselves.
